product_name: Sea to Summit Mini Stuff Sack Set
long_description: The Sea to Summit Mini Stuff Sack set comes with three versatile stuff sacks that can be used to separate clothing, food or gadgets. They are especially handy in carry-on luggage and backpacks. Made from 30-denier Ultra-Sil(R) Cordura(R) nylon, the stuff sacks are strong and water resistant. Set includes small, medium and large stuff sacks. Small has a capacity of 0.3 liter and weighs 0.2 oz., medium has a capacity of 0.75 liter and weighs 0.3 oz. and large has a capacity of 2.8 liters and weighs 0.5 oz. Fabric has a slippery finish for easy packing. Each stuff sack includes a loop that's perfect for attaching the stuff sack to your luggage. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The Sea to Summit Mini Stuff Sack set comes with three versatile stuff sacks that can be used to separate clothing, food or gadgets. They are especially handy in carry-on luggage and backpacks.
